description: Brazilian artist, residing in the federal capital since 2006, student of visual arts at the University of Brasília (UnB) interested in urban visualities.graffite, pixação, stencil, lambe-lambe, propaganda, collage. anarchist, utopian dreamer, lover of bohemia, loves to flirt with the unknown and the transgressive, using aggressive liguanges in order to translate the most daily aspirations of the young people of this era.
